isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Service (1995 through 1999) - SECTION 4: CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - SUPPLY MANIFOLD DISCONNECT POINTS - REMOVAL

svcprocinfo.para: Perform the following steps when removing the three-way fitting.

svcsubproc.title: Engines Equipped With Old Three-Way Fitting
Engines Equipped With New Three-Way Fitting

figure.caption: Figure 4.13 Supply Manifold Disconnect Points For Engines Equipped With Old Three-Way Fitting
Figure 4.14 Supply Manifold Disconnect Points For Engines Equipped With New Three-Way Fitting

svcsubproc.title: Engines Equipped With Engine Mounted ECM Unit
svcsubproc.para: If not already done, disconnect the fuel supply line from the fuel filter header to the supply manifold.

note.para: If it is necessary to remove the supply manifold from the cylinder head, refer to Section 12, "High Pressure Lube Oil System" for proper removal, maintenance and installation procedures.
